groups.help: Firewall user groups permitted to authenticate through this portal. Separate group names with spaces.
groups.name: groups

identity-based-route.help: Name of the identity-based route that applies to this portal.
identity-based-route.name: identity-based-route

portal-addr.help: Address (or FQDN) of the authentication portal.
portal-addr.name: portal-addr

portal-addr6.help: IPv6 address (or FQDN) of authentication portal.
portal-addr6.name: portal-addr6

proxy-auth.help: Enable/disable authentication by proxy daemon (default = disable).
proxy-auth.name: proxy-auth

options.help: Users are authenticated by proxy daemon.
options.name: enable

options.help: Users are not authenticated by proxy daemon.
options.name: disable
